file_content.text: You're always welcome in my laboratory.
Momi Andrell sent me. Said you could use these genetic samples to repopulate the shanjaru.
I don't know who you are, but you've saved an entire species from extinction.
You should rename them after me.
Interesting notion. I'll, ah, recommend it to the Galactic Species Preservation Society.
It seemed like the right thing to do.
You've kept a beautiful creature from vanishing forever.
I came a long way to deliver that. A little reward would be nice.
I'm sorry, I can't offer anything except gratitude.
I'll start working on these samples immediately. Thank you for delivering them.
Sorry, I'm busy conducting important research.
